mapper.insert: insert into pet (categoryId, name, photoUrls, tagId, status) values (#{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tagId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update pet set categoryId = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photoUrls = #{photoUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tagId = #{tagId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, categoryId, name, photoUrls, tagId, status from pet
